channel.title: CVE Feed for Talos -- ERPNext
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Talos -- ERPNext

item.title: CVE-2018-3883|2024-08-05T04:57:24.473Z -- talos -- erpnext
item.description: An exploitable SQL injection vulnerability exists in the authenticated part of ERPNext v10.1.6. Specially crafted web requests can cause SQL injections resulting in data compromise. The employee and sort_order parameter can be used to perform an SQL injection attack. An attacker can use a browser to trigger these vulnerabilities, and no special tools are required.

item.title: CVE-2018-3884|2024-08-05T04:57:24.219Z -- talos -- erpnext
item.description: An exploitable SQL injection vulnerability exists in the authenticated part of ERPNext v10.1.6. Specially crafted web requests can cause SQL injections resulting in data compromise. The sort_by and start parameter can be used to perform an SQL injection attack. An attacker can use a browser to trigger these vulnerabilities, and no special tools are required.

item.title: CVE-2018-3885|2024-08-05T04:57:24.456Z -- talos -- erpnext
item.description: An exploitable SQL injection vulnerability exists in the authenticated part of ERPNext v10.1.6. Specially crafted web requests can cause SQL injections resulting in data compromise. The order_by parameter can be used to perform an SQL injection attack. An attacker can use a browser to trigger these vulnerabilities, and no special tools are required.
